Title: Enacts the "Protecting Our Nursing Homes Act of 2021"
Summary: Enacts the "Protecting Our Nursing Homes Act" to establish a program to provide funding from the federal CARES act for nursing homes to purchase personal protective equipment, provide for the cost of COVID-19 testing, and to increase staffing.
ActClause: AN ACT enacting the "Protecting Our Nursing Homes Act of 2021" to establish a program to provide funding for nursing homes to purchase personal protective equipment, provide for the cost of COVID-19 testing, and to increase staffing; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
